meanings.definition: A highly toxic alkaloid found in certain plants, used as a pesticide and in medicine.
meanings.sent1: The strychnines in the plant can be harmful if ingested.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the effects of strychnines on insects.
meanings.sent3: The garden gnome accidentally sprinkled strychnines on the flowers instead of fertilizer!
meanings.sent4: The presence of strychnines in the ecosystem acted like a silent threat to small animals.
meanings.sent5: The label on the bottle warned of the dangers of strychnines inside.

meanings.definition: A white, crystalline powder derived from the seeds of the nux vomica tree, used as a poison.
meanings.sent1: The detective found traces of strychnines at the crime scene.
meanings.sent2: The villain carefully administered the lethal dose of strychnines.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat knocked over the jar of strychnines, causing chaos in the house.
meanings.sent4: The presence of strychnines in the drink was a sinister plot by the antagonist.
meanings.sent5: The tiny vial contained enough strychnines to cause harm if mishandled.
